name: Azora's Puzzle Adventure
description:
An artistic puzzle game for all DEMO VERSION

Take a deep dive into the world of Azora. Together with his old friend Crusty, they set off on a new adventure. In the abandoned temples, where plants are thirsty, YOU will need to help them to bloom once again. But how efficient are you able to go?

  • Help Azora reach the plant
  • Work with multible characters to reach your goal
  • Unlock new levels
Controls
  • arrow keys
  • spacebar
Sound Samples
  • zapsplat.com
  • mixkit.co
  • Music Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
  • Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
  • Rafael Krux (orchestralis.net)
  • Music promoted by The Free Cat: http://tiny.cc/50cnpz
Currently only available for Windows 

How to download:

  • Download the .zip file
  • Unzip file
  • Press on Azora icon
  • Select run anyway
  • Enjoy!
